Remote Servers offers web hosting services for startups, developers, or even for large-scale businesses. Scale up and watch your site grow with us!

Enjoy lightning-fast cPanel-based hosting on 1 Gbit networks. All accounts are instantly set-up after payment, so no need to wait before you get cracking on that project!

  • LiteSpeed Web Server
  • 1 Gbit on ALL locations
  • CloudLinux & PHP Version Selector (5.4, 5.5, 5.6, 7.0, 7.1, 7.2)
  • Softaculous Script Installer
